dev.b3nedikt.reword

Class Reword

  • dev.b3nedikt.reword.Reword

  • public class Reword

    Reword is a library to update the texts of views when the apps texts have changed due to a language change or an update of the apps string resources with a lib like restring.

    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCE

        public static Reword INSTANCE

        Reword is a library to update the texts of views when the apps texts have changed due to a language change or an update of the apps string resources with a lib like restring.

    • Method Detail

      • addViewTransformer

        @JvmStatic
public static void addViewTransformer(@NotNull
                                                  dev.b3nedikt.reword.transformer.ViewTransformer... viewTransformer)

        Register a new view transformer. Use this if you want to update the texts of a custom view.

        Parameters:
        viewTransformer - interface ViewTransformers to register

      • reword

        @JvmStatic
public static void reword(@NotNull
                                      android.view.View parent)

        Will update the text of all views in the view hierarchy below the provided parent view. Can be used to update the texts of a activity or fragment without restarting it. To do this just use the root view of the activity or fragment.

        Parameters:
        parent - the parent view of the views you want to update the texts of
